page.title: 14A Picture of Breedon/Tonge 2
page.content: public transport as well, so this is obviously a vital link to the larger cities and towns round the area. The gardens of the village are used for pleasure and vegetable growning. The main vegetables are peas and carrots and flower growing is very popular. There are four local shops in Breedon,Tonge does not have any. The one most used is the grocery store and the Post Office.Larger items are purchased outside the area. The majority of people like living in the villages because it is quiet and had beautiful countryside. The people have a variey of hobbies,the most popular being gardening, then sports,artwork, reading and knitting. Most of the hobbies are persued in the villages, this would support the villagers desire to stay in their villages.
